products.name: Pixel 8 Pro
products.description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro is the ultimate smartphone experience with advanced AI capabilities, professional-grade camera system, and stunning display. Features include the Tensor G3 chip, 6.7-inch Super Actua display, and industry-leading 7-year software support.

products.name: Pixel 8
products.description: Pixel 8 combines powerful AI features with a compact design. Enjoy Magic Eraser, Call Screen, and Live Translate with the Tensor G3 chip. The 6.2-inch Actua display is bright and smooth with 120Hz refresh rate.

products.name: Pixel 7a
products.description: The Pixel 7a delivers premium features at an affordable price. With the Google Tensor G2 chip, 64MP camera system, and wireless charging, it's the perfect balance of performance and value.

products.name: Pixel Fold
products.description: Google's first foldable smartphone combines a pocket-sized phone with a powerful tablet. The Pixel Fold features the thickest hinge in its class, premium materials, and all the Pixel AI features you love.

products.name: Pixel Tablet
products.description: The Pixel Tablet is perfect for entertainment and productivity. With the Tensor G2 chip, brilliant 11-inch display, and included Speaker Dock, it transforms from entertainment device to smart home hub.

products.name: Nest Hub Max
products.description: The Nest Hub Max is the perfect smart display for your home. With a 10-inch HD screen, Nest Cam built-in, and Google Assistant, it's your control center for smart home devices and video calls.

products.name: Nest Hub (2nd Gen)
products.description: The Nest Hub (2nd Gen) features sleep sensing technology to help you understand your sleep quality. Control your smart home, enjoy entertainment, and get help from Google Assistant.

products.name: Nest Audio
products.description: Nest Audio is a premium smart speaker with rich bass and clear vocals. Google Assistant helps you manage your day, control your smart home, and enjoy music from your favorite services.

products.name: Nest Mini (2nd Gen)
products.description: Nest Mini is Google's smallest smart speaker, but it packs a big sound. Ask questions, play music, and control your smart home with your voice or touch.

products.name: Nest Wifi Pro
products.description: Nest Wifi Pro provides reliable Wi-Fi 6E coverage throughout your home. With speeds up to 2x faster than Wi-Fi 6 and coverage for up to 2,200 sq. ft. per point.

products.name: Pixel Buds Pro
products.description: Pixel Buds Pro offer premium sound with Active Noise Cancellation, Silent Seal™ ear tips, and up to 11 hours of listening time. Perfect for music, calls, and Google Assistant on the go.

specs.features: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, Spatial Audio

products.name: Pixel Buds A-Series
products.description: Pixel Buds A-Series deliver great sound at an affordable price. With comfortable ear tips, up to 5 hours of listening time, and Google Assistant built-in, they're perfect for everyday use.

products.name: Pixel Stand (2nd Gen)
products.description: The Pixel Stand (2nd Gen) wirelessly charges your Pixel phone and transforms it into a smart display. Features fanless cooling, faster charging, and improved stability.

products.name: Pixel Watch 2
products.description: Pixel Watch 2 is the ultimate smartwatch with Fitbit integration. Features advanced health sensors, 24-hour battery life, GPS, and emergency SOS.

specs.sensors: Heart rate, SpO2, Skin temperature, ECG
specs.battery: 24 hours with Extreme Battery Saver mode

products.name: Chromecast with Google TV (4K)
products.description: Stream your favorite entertainment in stunning 4K HDR. Chromecast with Google TV brings together movies, shows, and more from all your apps in one place.

specs.features: Google TV interface, Voice remote with Google Assistant

products.name: Google Pixel 7 Pro Case
products.description: Protect your Pixel 7 Pro with the official Google case. Made with premium materials, precise cutouts, and wireless charging compatibility.

products.name: Nest Cam (Battery)
products.description: Nest Cam (Battery) is a versatile security camera that works indoors or outdoors. Features intelligent alerts, 1080p HD video, and up to 3 hours of event video history.

specs.storage: Local storage + 3 hours free cloud storage
specs.camera: 1080p HD with 130° diagonal field of view

products.name: Nest Doorbell (Battery)
products.description: Nest Doorbell (Battery) shows you who's at your door from anywhere. Get person, package, and vehicle alerts, and talk to visitors through the app.

specs.storage: Local storage + 3 hours free cloud storage

products.name: Nest Thermostat
products.description: Nest Thermostat helps you save energy with programmable schedules and smart features. Works with most HVAC systems and integrates with Google Assistant.

specs.compatibility: Most 24V systems, not compatible with high-voltage systems
